benchmark_details.name: EMBODIED CITY: A BENCHMARK PLATFORM FOR EMBODIED AGENT IN REAL-WORLD CITY ENVIRONMENT
benchmark_details.overview: This paper constructs a benchmark platform for evaluating embodied intelligence in real-world city environments, extending capabilities of existing embodied intelligence to higher levels. It includes a highly realistic 3D simulation environment based on a real city and a set of evaluation tasks covering various embodied intelligence abilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a systematic benchmark platform for embodied intelligence in urban environments, facilitating development and evaluation of embodied agents.

data.source: 3D simulation environment based on a real city in China, using historical traffic data and simulation algorithms.
data.annotation: Human efforts with ground-truth data obtained through various refinement processes.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on generated responses to embodied tasks, comparing them to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating responses for embodied tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Various multi-modal large language models like GPT-4 Turbo and Claude 3 are evaluated and compared.
